name: Drift (Over) Drive
description: In DoD you take the role of a driver passionate about drifting, driving your car around the world on all kinds of environments and weather conditions, while taking on different challenges and avoiding all kinds of obstacles and hazards.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Above Processor: Pentium Dual Core 2Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 136 MB available space
